ComicInfo.Summary: "For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?: Diabolique proclaims her curse on men just as Dr. Wells is sending Prophet through the Resurrection Machine to live another lifetime. Prophet finds himself in medieval France living the life of Joan of Arc.
ComicInfo.Title: "For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
